name: UIToolTipInteraction
desc: An interaction object that makes it possible to show a tooltip when hovering a pointer over a view or control.

items.name: init(defaultToolTip: String)
items.desc: Creates a tooltip interaction object and sets the default tooltip text.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the tooltip interaction is in the enabled state.

items.name: var defaultToolTip: String?
items.desc: The text that appears in a tooltip by default.

items.name: var delegate: UIToolTipInteractionDelegate?
items.desc: An object that provides text that a tooltip displays instead of the default text.

items.name: protocol UIToolTipInteractionDelegate
items.desc: An interface that provides tooltip settings to an interaction.
